#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#define sf scanf
#define pf printf
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	char s[51];
	int t;
	sf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	sf("%s",s);
	int k=strlen(s);
	for(int i=k/2-1;i>=0;i--)
	pf("%c",s[i]);
	for(int i=k-1;i>=k/2;i--)
	pf("%c",s[i]);
	pf("%s","\n");
	}
	
	
}
